attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The amount of crime, tax increase, limited housing and shier disregard for the British / Scottish people that has come since we joined the EU and started accepting immigrants is disgusting. We need our country back, in a vast amount of cities the British citizen is the minority this is WRONG!!

Help to control this unnecessary insult, get back some PRIDE and do the country a favour by signing!!

Thanks

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
